page.title: 13The Henley Mayfair
page.content: We interviewed Mrs. Day, she told us about the Henley Mayfair. It was her idea, it first came into her head when she was on top of St. Mary's Church tower in 1974. At the time she was Mayor of Henley. The fair started in 1975. It wasn't hard to organise but it took a long time. The organisation begins in November of the previous year. She doesn't get paid because she does it voluntarily. Mrs. Day has been organising the May Fair for 11 years and her last year was 1985 .Mrs. Day has tried to think of new ideas but she couldn't so she is giving the job to someone else. She says the town is the best place to have it. The best year, she says, was the first year because everyone dressed in Elizabethan costume. She hopes the May fair will carry on for much longer bringing new ideas.
